The coloration of grass plants is dependent on the [[biome]] they are in. A grass block always uses the color set to its location, regardless of how it was placed or of its source. This affects the side and top of the block.

{{IN|BE}}, biome colors also appear on [[Map|maps]].<ref>{{Cite bug|MC|130658|Grass/foliage colors on maps still use the colors from Alpha v1.1.2_01 and earlier / do not change color with biomes|June 2, 2018}}</ref>

=== Color ===

==== Item ====

* {{IN|Java}}, grass items use biome color with temperature 0.5, downfall 1.0, and as a result is colored {{color|#7cbd6b}}. {{IN|BE}}, this color is coded in the item's texture.

==== Biome colors ====
These values are generated by the biome dyeing algorithm. See [[biome colors]] for more information.
